Ranking do Simulado

Posição E-mail Pontos
{{i+1}} {{usuario.valueOf() + " " + isLoaded}} {{usuario.email}} {{usuario.acertoUsuario}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import IRankingSimulado from "../../interfaces/IRankingSimulado"; import {RankingSimuladoService} from "../../services/rankingSimulado.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-ranking-simulado', templateUrl: './ranking-simulado.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ranking-simulado.component.css'] }) export class RankingSimuladoComponent implements OnInit{ ranking:IRankingSimulado[] = [] isLoaded:boolean=false constructor(private service: RankingSimuladoService) { } ngOnInit() { this.fazerConsulta() console.log(this.ranking) } fazerConsulta() { this.service.consultar(1) .subscribe(dados => { this.ranking = dados.sort( (a, b) => { return b.acertoUsuario - a.acertoUsuario } ) this.isLoaded = true console.log(this.ranking) }) } }
